name: Deep Sleep
storyline:
Sleep is the most relaxing and enjoyable moment of the day
This is the reward you deserve for working all day
In this environment you are most familiar with, remember everything here
You are the safest

But today is different. You feel like something terrifying is happening in the room
Find any abnormalities in the room, eliminate them, and keep yourself awake
Tonight, never, never, never fall asleep

Wait a minute, why is there a very familiar feeling? Are you sure you were sleeping just now?
summary: A horror game about infinite dreams, where you need to constantly find abnormal places in the room to stay awake, otherwise you will fall into terrifying dreams
